posts.post_content:
I'm still looking to complete my T205 Sovereign back set, so if you have any available, let me know.  I especially need Graham, Gray, and Harmon at the moment.  If you have something, send a price, or request my trade list.  I don't have a ton to spend, so I am unlikely to buy anything better than Vg right now, maybe EX commons.  Thanks!

Take Care,
Geno
